data.title: Buy Tickets to LUZIA | Cirque du Soleil
data.meta_description: Buy tickets for LUZIA, touring show, at Under the Big Top, Higham Car Park at Claremont Showground in Perth, WA created by Cirque du Soleil. View seating chart & price.
data.text: LUZIA is inspired by the people, places, and stories that define Mexico. Take a journey through a dream of Mexico, from the folklore of old to the urban landscape of today. LUZIA takes you to an imaginary Mexico, like in a waking dream, where light (“luz” in Spanish) quenches the spirit and rain (“lluvia”) soothes the soul. With a surrealistic series of grand visual surprises and breathtaking acrobatic performances, LUZIA cleverly brings to the stage multiple places, faces and sounds of Mexico taken from both tradition and modernity.
